channel.title: [317]Change 317 Character to 508?
channel.description:
How would I change the 317 character stance and everything? I want to change it to a 508+.
This looked like the thing to change to make 508 characters: [code] public int playerSE = 0x328; // SE = Standard Emotion public int playerSEA = 0x326; // SEA = Standard Emotion Attack public int playerSER = 0x338; // SER = Standard Emotion Run public int playerSEW = 0x333; // SEW = Standard Emotion Walking public int pEmote = 0x328; // this being the original standing state public int pWalk = 0x333; // original walking animation public int playerFly = 0x2261; // Flying Emotion[/code] So how do I change it?

item.title: [317]Change 317 Character to 508?
item.dc:creator: @RS_Gamer001 RS Gamer001
item.description:
@RS_Gamer001 wrote:

How would I change the 317 character stance and everything? I want to change it to a 508+.

This looked like the thing to change to make 508 characters:

public int playerSE = 0x328; // SE = Standard Emotion public int playerSEA = 0x326; // SEA = Standard Emotion Attack public int playerSER = 0x338; // SER = Standard Emotion Run public int playerSEW = 0x333; // SEW = Standard Emotion Walking public int pEmote = 0x328; // this being the original standing state public int pWalk = 0x333; // original walking animation public int playerFly = 0x2261; // Flying Emotion
So how do I change it?
